title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 812.12 - State aid payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 812.12 - State aid payments

State Regulations
(a) Payment of

State aid shall be made to the county after the commissioner has made his
determination pursuant to section
812.11
(b)(1)
and
after the legislative body of the county has notified the commissioner in
writing that it has adopted the charter law for submission to the electors as
may be required by law. (b) All
payment shall be made after audit and upon warrant of the Comptroller on
vouchers approved by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
812.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
